text:
on rightclick holding a feather:
	if name of held item contains "&7Fly":
		push player upwards at speed 1.2
		push the player forward at speed 0.3
		play raw sound "mob.ghast.fireball" at player with pitch 1 volume 10

on leftclick holding a feather:
	if name of held item contains "&7Fly":
		push player upwards at speed 0.2
		push the player forward at speed 1.8
		play raw sound "mob.ghast.fireball" at player with pitch 1 volume 10

on break:
	if name of held item contains "&7Fly":
		cancel event
